career.name: CVS Health Co. (Branding Brand)
career.title: Senior Software Engineer
description: Architected framework-agnostic TypeScript packages to centralize core logic, enforcing Jest and documentation standards to empower external teams to ship features independently
Engineered regulatory compliance workflow for pseudoephedrine purchases (ID.me) in Next.js, advocating for a unified data contract that accelerated web and mobile development
Architected client-side migration strategy to consume a unified GraphQL API, designing custom adapter patterns to eliminate network waterfalls without service interruption
Orchestrated third-party ad integrations with strict API contracts, implementing React logic for targeted advertising without compromising frontend performance
Collaborated on next-gen tech stack with Next.js core, migrating high-traffic Product Detail Page to improve page speed and developer velocity

career.name: Freelance
career.title: Full-Stack Engineer
description: Engineered 'Mise,' a full-stack Resource Planning solution that centralized inventory, order management, and projections for Candelari's multi-location expansion
Designed the full-stack app using Next.js, TypeScript, tRPC, and PostgreSQL with resilient DevOps infrastructure on Railway
Implemented comprehensive order history system enabling the business to audit purchasing trends and cost fluctuations

career.name: Poetic
career.title: Software Developer
description: Collaborated on full-stack development of a B2B dealer portal for Kobelco Cranes using React, TypeScript, and GraphQL
Implemented key features for parts ordering system enabling authorized dealers to query real-time inventory
Expanded backend architecture of Houston Food Bank's volunteer management system using Ruby on Rails
